explanation: [0-0] A man in a gray shirt and blue shorts kneels in front of a large TV screen. He's holding a white toothbrush in one hand and resting his other hand on the TV. He's watching a scene from the animated movie Frozen, where Elsa is sleeping in bed.

[0-9] The man slides his hand up the TV screen. Suddenly, Elsa's face turns toward him. The man stops brushing his teeth, lifts his hand, and smells his breath. Then, he leans in towards the TV as if to kiss Elsa. Elsa wakes up and widens her eyes. The man straightens up, flustered, continues brushing his teeth, and walks away from the TV.

[9-17] The scene then changes. The man reappears, this time wearing a white T-shirt. He is holding a black frying pan and facing the TV. The TV screen displays a scene from Tom and Jerry. Tom peeks out his head. The man swings the pan towards the TV, and Tom ducks down. On screen, Tom hides again. The man whistles, and Tom pops his head out again. The man slams the frying pan against the TV, and Tom makes a pained expression.
